body_html: @ebrevdo I could try to help out with __getitem__ / __setitem__ if it would be useful. I think these ops are going to be the most intuitive way for people to interact with tensors especially since most are already comfortable with how numpy works. Would you like me to try or would it be better to just leave you to implement it?

body: @ebrevdo I could try to help out with `__getitem__` / `__setitem__` if it would be useful. I think these ops are going to be the most intuitive way for people to interact with tensors especially since most are already comfortable with how numpy works. Would you like me to try or would it be better to just leave you to implement it?
